snippet.title: Lilia: The Fallen Flower in the Prison City - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In the trade city of Marigold, a spirited woman, Lilia, sets off on her grand adventure. However, while exploring the dungeon, she runs into a potential ally, Sheryl. Can these two opposing personalities work together to survive the dungeon?

Lilia: The Fallen Flower in the Prison City on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/lilia-the-fallen-flower-in-the-prison-city/

Lilia: The Fallen Flower in the Prison City on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3041820/Lilia_The_Fallen_Flower_in_the_Prison_City/
